body.p: The affiant states that he was a juror in the Case of against &Alfred Brockthe CommonwealthUriah Kevilc which was tried at the last June term of the , & states that the testimony of Dr.Lyon Circuit Court did not agree with the ballance of the evidence adduced Geiserin the Cause, upon the trial of the Cause,
Sworn to before me by Alfred Brock this 5 day of August 1863,
I am personally acquainted with A Brock and know him to be a man of truth and veracity. Aug 5 1863.

A. H. Dudley clk
Lyon County Court
